events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 28, 2024, resulting in moderate damage to the car’s front bumper and headlights.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and vehicle damage.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle this vehicle collision claim to ensure timely communication and processing.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and assured that investigation will be initiated shortly.
Requested documents including police report, vehicle photos, and driver’s license to support the investigation of the collision claim.
Customer submitted all requested documentation, including detailed photos of damage and the official police accident report.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision commenced, with insurance adjusters reviewing all submitted evidence.
The investigation concluded that the other driver was at fault, and the claim is valid for repair coverage.
A settlement proposal was made to cover vehicle repairs, including parts and labor, based on the damage assessment.
Customer provided positive feedback on the clear communication and prompt handling of their auto accident claim.
The claim has been formally approved by the insurance company following acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment was issued to the repair shop directly to cover all authorized repairs related to the vehicle collision.
The vehicle collision claim has been closed successfully after confirmation of completed repairs and payment.
